hero.title: Professional Web Development
hero.subtitle: Premium web agency with 9 years experience: website development, Angular/React applications, responsive design. Complete services for businesses in Iași, Bucharest, Cluj and across Romania.
hero.seoContent: Professional website development and web application services in Romania. Web agency specialized in frontend development (Angular, React, Vue.js), Node.js backend, responsive design, SEO optimization. 9 years experience, 85+ completed projects. Serving clients in Iași, Bucharest, Cluj-Napoca, Timișoara and throughout Romania.
hero.ctaAriaLabel: Contact me to start your web development project
hero.secondaryAriaLabel: View my portfolio and completed projects

services.title: What I Offer
services.subtitle: Comprehensive web development services tailored to your needs

professional-web-design-agency.title: Frontend Development
professional-web-design-agency.description: Modern, responsive interfaces built with Angular, React, or Vue.js. Specializing in component-based architecture, state management (Redux, NgRx), performance optimization, and progressive web apps (PWA). We create pixel-perfect designs that work flawlessly across all devices and browsers, with emphasis on accessibility (WCAG 2.1), semantic HTML, and CSS best practices. Our frontend solutions include lazy loading, code splitting, and optimized bundle sizes for lightning-fast load times.

advanced-frontend-development.title: Backend Development
advanced-frontend-development.description: Robust server-side solutions with Node.js, Express, NestJS, and RESTful/GraphQL APIs. Expert in database design (PostgreSQL, MongoDB, MySQL), authentication & authorization (JWT, OAuth2, SSO), caching strategies (Redis), message queues, and microservices architecture. We build scalable backends with proper error handling, logging, monitoring, and comprehensive API documentation. Our solutions include rate limiting, data validation, security best practices (SQL injection prevention, XSS protection), and automated testing with Jest/Mocha.

technical-consulting-seo.title: Full-Stack Solutions & SEO
technical-consulting-seo.description: Complete end-to-end web applications from concept to production deployment. Our full-stack expertise covers frontend frameworks, backend APIs, database architecture, cloud deployment (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud), CI/CD pipelines, and DevOps practices. Specialized in technical SEO: structured data (Schema.org), Core Web Vitals optimization, semantic HTML, meta tags management, sitemap generation, robots.txt configuration, hreflang implementation for multi-language sites, and Google Analytics/Search Console integration. We also provide technical consulting on architecture decisions, code reviews, performance auditing with Lighthouse/PageSpeed, security assessments, and technology stack selection tailored to your business needs.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: 9 Years of Crafting Digital Solutions That Drive Business Growth
about.description: Full-stack development team passionate about creating efficient, scalable web applications that solve real business problems. With extensive experience in both frontend and backend technologies, we deliver complete solutions from initial design and architecture planning through development, testing, and production deployment. Our commitment to code quality, performance, and user experience sets us apart.
about.description1: With 9 years of professional web development experience, we specialize in building modern, production-ready web applications using cutting-edge technologies and industry best practices. From dynamic single-page applications (SPAs) to complex enterprise backend systems, we deliver maintainable, well-tested code that scales with your business. Our expertise spans the entire web development lifecycle: requirements analysis, system architecture design, UI/UX implementation, API development, database optimization, automated testing, CI/CD setup, cloud deployment, and ongoing maintenance. We've successfully delivered 85+ projects across diverse industries including e-commerce, healthcare, fintech, education, and SaaS platforms.
about.description2: Every project receives meticulous attention to detail and a commitment to excellence. We focus on clean, documented code architecture following SOLID principles, comprehensive performance optimization (lazy loading, caching, CDN integration), user-centric design that delivers measurable business value, and technical SEO implementation from day one. Our development process includes code reviews, automated testing (unit, integration, e2e), security audits, accessibility compliance (WCAG 2.1), and performance monitoring. We believe in transparent communication, agile methodologies, and delivering projects on time and within budget. Your success is our success, and we're invested in building long-term partnerships with our clients.

quote.text: Turning complex requirements into elegant, maintainable solutions
quote.author: WebFirm Team

links.interestedInWorking: Interested in working together? Learn more
links.getInTouchToday: Get in touch with us today

ecommerce.title: E-Commerce Platform
ecommerce.description: Full-featured online store with Stripe payment gateway integration, real-time inventory management, admin dashboard with analytics, order tracking, customer accounts, and responsive mobile-first design. Built with React, Node.js, MongoDB, and deployed on AWS with auto-scaling capabilities.

corporate.title: Corporate Web Application
corporate.description: Enterprise management system with real-time data visualization using D3.js, role-based access control (RBAC), multi-department workflows, document management, employee portal, and comprehensive reporting. Developed with Angular 17, NestJS backend, PostgreSQL database, and integrated with existing enterprise systems via REST APIs.

startup.title: SaaS Product Landing
startup.description: Modern, conversion-optimized landing page with lead generation forms, A/B testing capability, Google Analytics 4 integration, email marketing automation (Mailchimp), and mobile-responsive design. Implemented with Next.js for optimal SEO, Tailwind CSS for styling, and deployed on Vercel with 99.9% uptime.

restaurant.title: Restaurant Management System
restaurant.description: Complete solution with online ordering system, table reservation management, real-time order tracking, kitchen display system (KDS), inventory management, customer loyalty program, and payment processing. Built with Vue.js frontend, Express.js backend, Firebase for real-time updates, and integrated with POS systems.

saas.title: Analytics Dashboard
saas.description: Real-time data visualization platform with complex interactive charts using Chart.js and D3.js, custom KPI widgets, data export functionality (CSV, PDF), user activity tracking, and white-label capabilities. Developed with React, Redux for state management, WebSocket connections for live data, and MongoDB for time-series data storage.

blog.title: Content Management Platform
blog.description: Custom CMS with advanced SEO optimization features, multi-language support (i18n), WYSIWYG editor, image optimization and CDN integration, scheduled publishing, user roles and permissions, and comprehensive analytics. Built with Angular, Node.js, MongoDB, and includes sitemap generation, meta tag management, and structured data implementation for rich snippets.
